title: 10 Inch Soft Among Plush US Toys, Stuffed Animal Plushie Among U&s Doll Gifts for Game Fans Kids, Boys and Girls
description:
About this item
💝Distinctive Stuffed Plush Toy💝: The astronaut plush toy is designed by the combination of the famous games, which has big bulging eyes, cute back pillow and bright color combination. Kids and adults will love this cute plush toy.
💝Soft Plush💝: The soft plush toy is made of soft short plush, filled with good quality cotton, comfortable to hold or play. Besides, it is not easy to deform,which can be used to relieve stress.
💝Wide Application💝: The amongus game plush toy is 6.5 inches long, 6 inches wide and 10 inches high, suitable for kids to bring with everywhere, play and hold when sleeping. You can also put it on your desk, bedside, shelf, counter and sofa as a beautiful decoration.
💝Durable & Easy to Clean💝: Every detail of the fabric is meticulously sewn to ensure its durability.The cute plush doll can also be washed by hand or in the washing machine, so you don't need to worry about it getting dirty.
💝Amazing Gifts💝: This plush toy is designed to be realistic and cute, as a amazing gift for game fans, kids, friends and family.

title: Besonca Hedgehog Plush Figure Knuckles Toy Cartoon Character Figure Plush Shadow The Hedgehog Plush Stuffed Plush Doll Best Gifts for Game Fans and Kids
description:
About this item
【High Quality】The exterior of this Knuckles plush toy is made of super soft & comfortable short plush, and the interior is filled with pp cotton, which is soft and skin-friendly, with complete stitching, gives you super soft feeling and is not easy to deform or pull the thread.
【Wide Application】This is a combination doll of Knuckles and among&us,it can be decorated in the bedroom, living room, car,office, adding a warm atmosphere to your space, or as a decompression doll, when you are upset, pinch this little plush toy to release stress.
【Best Gift】Cute Hedgehog toys are great to accompany you to sleep, watch TV and read books, which is a ideal gift choice for your kids, friends and family. No one doesn't like cute soft and fluffy plush dolls.
【Beautiful Room Decorations】These cute knuckles plush dolls can decor your room, providing a sense of security, making your home full of happiness and love.
【Customer Service】If you have any questions about this knuckles plush toy, please feel free to contact us, we will make it right as soon as possible.

title: JUSHOO 9 Inch Blue Hedgehog Stuffed Plush Toy, Soft So-nic Plushie Doll for Game Fans, Kids Birthday Party Favor and Home Decor
description:
About this item
【Collectible Toy】- This upgrade stuffed animal Plush is derived from a popular game, let you get close to the characters of game, which can give you different character inspirations, bringing you unexpected surprises. Are you ready to let it join your toy squad?
【Material & Size】- The hedgehog plush is made of skin friendly silk wadding and soft plush, filled with supper soft PP cotton, featured with elastic, safe, comfortable to touch, and not easy to deformed; the size measures 22 cm/9 inch, suitable for carrying
【Wide Application】- Multi-color design on doll's nose and legs makes it cute enough, very suitable for decorating on your desk ,bedside, shelf, tabletop, counter and sofa; Also you can hug or throw it as a stress relief plush toy. It will be a good partner
【Durable & Easy to Clean】- Careful stitching every detail of fabric makes sure its quality, and the surface of the game plush doll is washable by hand and machine, so don’t worry about getting dirty, just enjoy your game time
【Great Gift Choice 】- This soft stuffed animal plush toy is comfortable to embrace with while watching movie, long car or plane ride, relaxing and sleeping, which is very suitable for game fans collection and kids birthday gift

reviews.name: Odessa sullen
reviews.reviewTitle: Did Plush all I need is tails
reviews.review: It came in a day and it was Golden The plush has good stuffing everything is attached nothing is wrong with it I just wish there was a tails one I would order that too

reviews.name: Kailey
reviews.review: I received this product with a timely delivery and it isn't the best, but it definitely does the job. I would buy it again.

reviews.name: Teresa Rivera
reviews.review: I bought as a gift for my bf

reviews.name: Jonathan
reviews.reviewTitle: Well made but much smaller than described!
reviews.review: Such a cute and unique Among Us/Sonic the Hedgehog themed stuffed animal! Very soft and immediately enjoyable! I am disappointed with the exaggeration in size, I personally look ahead at those details before purchasing and this was WAY OFF.

reviews.name: Adam
reviews.review: This is very soft, and adorable… But the size is very off in the description! As other reviews have stated, it is closer to 6.5 inches, very small for the price! Disappointed.

reviews.name: aplus
reviews.review: The picture on the website looks like a fuzzy animal, and it says it is a "plush" toy! There is nothing about this toy that is PLUSH or fuzzy. It is vacuumed packed into a small square and does not look plush or fuzzy or anything desirable. DO NOT PURCHASE!
